titleStmt.title: A full, true and particular account of the ghost or apparition of the late Duke of Buckingham's father which several times appeared in armor to one of the Duke's servant; and for about half a year before foretold the Duke's death.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.C. in the Old Bailey,

notesStmt.note: On page 2 at head of text: Extract a Monsieur d'Ablancour, le Vie le Grand Duc de Buckingham.
Place of publication and suggested imprint date from Wing.
Purports to be an account of the appearance of Sir George Villiers to his widow to warn her of the death of George Villiers, Duke of Buckingham.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
